FAQ.TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.SUBTITLE: Common questions and answers about services, costs, and delivery.

ITEM_1.Q: Can an online store be implemented through this service?
ITEM_1.A: Yes. I build professional Shopify stores that scale with your business growth. I handle the technical implementation from payments to shipping to ensure you have a secure and easy-to-use platform for sales.

ITEM_2.Q: Can I influence the design and colors of the site myself?
ITEM_2.A: Absolutely. I build every site to support your brand and sales goals. Unlike restricted ready-made templates, this model gives you the freedom to choose the style, colors, and structure that fit your brand without technical constraints.

ITEM_3.Q: How do you ensure the site appears in search engines?
ITEM_3.A: Sites are built to utilize technical search engine optimization (SEO) in every project. This means clean code, ultra-fast loading times, and structures favored by Google. This ensures that customers find your business in search results.

ITEM_4.Q: Can I update images or content myself later?
ITEM_4.A: Updates and content changes are handled centrally through me. This ensures the site's code remains clean and performance stays top-notch even after launch. I offer content changes as a free service once a month when delivered in bulk. For more frequent content updates or features, a separate editing tool can be developed during site development. You do not need to learn complex control panels or worry about the site breaking, as I take care of the technical implementation for you.

ITEM_5.Q: Does the site work as well on phones and laptops?
ITEM_5.A: Yes. All the sites I build are fully responsive. They are optimized to provide a seamless user experience on all devices from small phone screens to large desktop displays.

ITEM_6.Q: How much does site maintenance cost after launch?
ITEM_6.A: I offer affordable professional maintenance starting from 20 euros per month. This price includes high-quality hosting and security updates to keep your site secure and fast constantly. If your company does not have its own domain name yet, registration is available through me starting from 10 euros per year. I also help with setting up professional business emails, costing from 1 euro per month per mailbox.

ITEM_7.Q: Who builds the sites and why can I trust the quality?
ITEM_7.A: I implement every project myself using the best coding standards in the industry. I use the same technologies utilized by the world's largest software companies. This guarantees you fast delivery and top quality. My work always comes with a risk-free one-year warranty, during which I fix any occurring issues free of charge.

ITEM_8.Q: When and how is the project paid for?
ITEM_8.A: More detailed payment terms are always agreed upon project-specifically during the contract phase. Typically, we follow a model where payment is made in stages as the work progresses. This ensures a clear and secure process for both parties.
